content: 2011 Singaporean film ***The Ultimate Winner*** ([Chinese](/wiki/Chinese_language): 赢家) is a 2011 Singaporean [Christian](/wiki/Christianity) [drama](/wiki/Drama_(film_and_television)) film directed by and starring [Li Nanxing](/wiki/Li_Nanxing) in his directorial debut. The film also stars [Constance Song](/wiki/Constance_Song), [Rebecca Lim](/wiki/Rebecca_Lim), [Chen Chao-jung](/wiki/Chen_Chao-jung) and [Dai Xiangyu](/wiki/Dai_Xiangyu). The film revolves around the struggles of a habitual gambler who is drawn into a life of pain by his gambling addiction. However, he is brought to a realisation through his religious wife and turns over a new leaf. ## Cast - [Li Nanxing](/wiki/Li_Nanxing) as Shi Tiancai - [Constance Song](/wiki/Constance_Song) as Honey Ma - [Rebecca Lim](/wiki/Rebecca_Lim) as Zhang Zhihui - [Chen Chao-jung](/wiki/Chen_Chao-jung) as Li Guanjun - [Dai Xiangyu](/wiki/Dai_Xiangyu) as Sky - [Zheng Geping](/wiki/Zheng_Geping) as Datuk Ong - [Rayson Tan](/wiki/Rayson_Tan) as Zheng Youyi - [Phyllis Quek](/wiki/Phyllis_Quek) as Zhang Zhifang - [Huang Shinan](/wiki/Huang_Shinan) as Tiancai's father - [Chen Shucheng](/wiki/Chen_Shucheng) as Uncle Lim - [Chen Liping](/wiki/Chen_Liping) as Staff Sergeant - Jiang Jiaxi as Manager - *The Ultimate Winner* at [IMDb](/wiki/IMDb_(identifier)) This article related to a Singaporean film is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: The Ultimate Winner
